email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under FOB terms. Could you provide a rate estimate and vessel availability for this shipment? Ideally, we are targeting a laycan of October 10-15.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, which is currently in Antwerp and can be repositioned to Rotterdam for your laycan. The starting freight rate is USD 65 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 190m, which should be suitable for your cargo.

Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 65 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Rotterdam?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 60 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, and the loading window in Rotterdam is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this revised offer works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 60 per metric tonne is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the MV OCEAN TRADER, and confirm the laycan of October 10-15. Also, please send over the contract details at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000 MT - Booking Confirmed
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Great news! The booking for the MV OCEAN TRADER has been confirmed for your laycan of October 10-15. I will send over the contract details shortly. Thank you for your business, and please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee
